name: El Poco Cantina
description:
An adver mobile game to promote and advertise the products and services of the local brand of El Poco Cantina.

In this idle game, you play as the mascot we made for El Poco Cantina. Shoot your food gun onto the angry hungry students, until they're satisfied and happy.
Upgrade your stats, finish the daily challenges, watch advertisements for bonuses, unlock skills, even buy in app purchases for a huge upgrade, and many more.
